testcase.name: CreatheUser

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"xyz","job":"Tester"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("applicaion/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
